content: I do not promote any particular product or brand, but there are several good tick repellent sprays available that are specifically designed for horses. look for products that contain active ingredients such as permethrin, pyrethrin, or cypermethrin, as these have been shown to be effective against ticks. you may also want to consider natural tick repellent sprays that use essential oils like citronella or lavender. however, before using any tick repellent spray on your horse, it's always best to consult with your veterinarian to ensure that it's safe and appropriate for your horse's individual needs.
